about_the_game:
Build your own Wild West town from scratch! Create a dream city for cowboys and cowgirls. It is totally up to you how it will look and prosper.


Gather resources in order to expand. There are many different structures to choose from- saloon, general store, gunsmith, church, stables, hotel, post office and many more! You can focus on upgrading your existing town or move on to the next one when you're ready.


Protect your citizens! There will be folks who will try to disturb your peace. You'll need to keep your eyes open at all time. Hire the sheriff, the hangman and let them do their job...


Explore the desert and find new places to live. Build the railway station and expand the railroad network between your cities- that way you can move materials and citizens between them!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Additional Notes: The game is still in development, system requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD GPU Radeon R9 280X
  • Additional Notes: The game is still in development, system requirements may change.

short_description: Build the Old West towns and connect them with railroads! Explore the dead land of American desert and bring it to life. Build your own town from scratch- take care of your people, gather resources and expand the railroad network.
